_comment: SBP Transducer - 3-12 kHz for sub-bottom profiling
description: Sub-bottom profiler transducer, 3-12 kHz frequency range, optimized for deep penetration (50+ m)
_comment_f_0: Central frequency, Hz (midpoint of 3-12 kHz range)
_comment_S_TX: Transmit sensitivity, dB re 1µPa/V @ 1m (adjusted for SL = 210 dB at V_nominal)
_comment_S_RX: Receive sensitivity, dB re 1V/µPa (high for low frequency)
_comment_Theta_BW: Beam angle at -3 dB, degrees conical (wider for low frequency)
_comment_Q: Q-factor (f_0 / B_tr) - low Q for wideband operation
_comment_T_rd: Ring-down time, microseconds (longer for low frequency)
_comment_V_max: Maximum transmit voltage, Vrms at 10% duty cycle (for peak power: SL_max = S_TX + 20*log10(V_max) = 180 + 20*log10(250) ≈ 228 dB)
_comment_V_nominal: Nominal transmit voltage, Vrms (for normal operation: SL = S_TX + 20*log10(V_nominal) = 180 + 20*log10(32) ≈ 210 dB)
_comment_application: Designed for sub-bottom profiling at depths up to 50+ meters. Low frequency provides deep penetration into sediment layers.
